Spicy Chickpea and Spinach Stew

Hearty Chickpea and Spinach Delight

Ingredients:

1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed

2 cups fresh spinach

1 onion, chopped

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 can diced tomatoes

1 tablespoon olive oil

1 teaspoon cumin

1 teaspoon paprika

1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper

Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:

Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.

Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, sautéing for 3-4 minutes until the onion is translucent.

Stir in the cumin, paprika, and cayenne pepper, cooking for an additional minute to release the spices' aromas.

Add the diced tomatoes and chickpeas to the pot, stirring to combine. Season with salt and pepper.

Bring the mixture to a simmer and let cook for 10-15 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.

Fold in the fresh spinach and cook for another 2-3 minutes until wilted.

Serve hot with crusty bread or over rice.

Prep Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 20 minutes | Total Time: 30 minutes

Kcal: 220 kcal | Servings: 4 servings

DISH PRESENTATION PARAGRAPHS

This Spicy Chickpea and Spinach Stew is a vibrant and nourishing dish that combines the earthiness of chickpeas with the freshness of spinach. The rich flavors of spices create a warm and inviting aroma that fills your kitchen.

Perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or meal prep, this stew is not only delicious but also packed with nutrients. Serve it with crusty bread or over a bed of rice for a complete meal that will satisfy your hunger and warm your soul.
